Properties.Value: This guide will help you define member and representative companies in the VAT group. Group members submit VAT returns to the group representative, who then submits the aggregated return for all member companies to the tax authorities.
Properties.Name: Caption

Properties.Value: The VAT Group Management extension makes it easy to be part of a VAT group.
Properties.Name: InstructionalText

Properties.Value: Choose Next to configure your company's role in the VAT group.
Properties.Name: InstructionalText

Properties.Value: Choose your company's role in the VAT group
Properties.Name: Caption

Properties.Value: The configuration settings depend on your role in the VAT group.
Properties.Name: InstructionalText

Properties.Value: Specifies whether you are a member of the group, or the group's representative.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: To continue, you must specify your role in the VAT group.
Properties.Name: InstructionalText

Properties.Value: Choose this option to act as the group representative and submit vat returns on behalf of the group. Group members will submit their VAT returns to you instead of the tax authority.
Properties.Name: InstructionalText

Properties.Value: Choose this option to act as a group member and submit VAT your returns to the group representative instead of the tax authority.
Properties.Name: InstructionalText

Properties.Value: To add members, choose the number in the Approved Members field.
Properties.Name: Caption

Properties.Value: My company is the group representative
Properties.Name: Caption

Properties.Value: As the group representative you must define a list of approved group members who submit their VAT returns to you. You can manage group members on the VAT Report Setup page.
Properties.Name: InstructionalText

Properties.Value: Specifies the number of approved members that are allowed to submit their VAT returns. Clicking on this number will open the Approved Members page.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the settlement account for the VAT group member amounts.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the normal VAT settlement account.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the box that represents the total due VAT amount from a VAT Group Submission.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the general journal template used for the document to post the Group VAT to the settlement account.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Enter connection settings for the group representative company's Business Central. Connection settings can differ, depending on how Business Central is deployed. The representative can provide this information.
Properties.Name: Caption

Properties.Value: My company is a member of the VAT group
Properties.Name: Caption

Properties.Value: As a group member, you must connect to the representative company for your VAT group.
Properties.Name: InstructionalText

Properties.Value: Specifies the product version that the group representative uses.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the API URL of the representative company's Business Central or Dynamics NAV.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the name of the company in the representative's Business Central or Dynamics NAV that will receive your VAT returns.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the authentication types that you can use when connecting to a VAT group representative using Business Central.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Group Representative Uses Business Central Online

Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Please fill in the User Name and Web Service Access Key of the user in the group representative.

Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Specifies the web service access key of a user in the representative company's Business Central that you will use when you connect.
Properties.Name: ToolTip

Properties.Value: Click Next to authenticate, get access to the group representative's API and continue.

Properties.Name: InstructionalText

Properties.Value: Choose the VAT Report Configuration that is currently being used to send reports to the authorities. At the end of the setup we will create a new configuration based on the one chosen here which will be used to send VAT reports to the group representative.
Properties.Name: InstructionalText
